price: Lalle* shĩ wanda ya je wa Ubangijinsa yanã mai laifi, to lalle ne yanã da Jahannama, bã ya mutuwa a cikinta kuma bã ya rãyuwa.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأۡتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجۡرِمٗا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
footnotes: * Ãyã ta 74 da ta 75 maganar Allah ce dõmin ƙarin bayãni a kan maganar masihirta a bãyan sun musulunta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innahu man yati rabbahu muj'riman fa-inna lahu jahannama lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
